description: Numbers n such that 43^n-42 is prime.
comments: Related to hyperperfect numbers of a certain form.The 1017 term produces a 1662-digit number which is only a probable prime. Any additional terms are greater than 1500.The next terms are > 3000. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 27 2012
links: J. S. McCranie, A study of hyperperfect numbers, J. Int. Seqs. Vol. 3 (2000) #P00.1.3.
author: _Jud McCranie_
